content:
I'm so glad you're excited about the Petcube Interactive Wall Toy! It's definitely a great option for cats who love to play and problem-solve. The remote-controlled laser pointer and treat dispenser features will likely provide hours of entertainment for Luna.

Remember to introduce the toy gradually and observe Luna's behavior to ensure she's comfortable and enjoying herself. You can start by placing the toy at a low height and gradually move it to a higher position as she becomes more confident and engaged.

Also, don't forget to rotate the toy regularly to keep things fresh and exciting for Luna. You can try moving it to different locations or swapping it out with other toys to keep her engaged and stimulated.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask! I'm always here to help.

Good luck, and I hope Luna has a blast with her new toy!
